title: FS: T206 Harry Lumley SGC 84, looks like a 8**SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Harry Lumley SGC 84, looks like a 8**SOLD**
posts.post_content: Absolutely incredible card, razor sharp corners.  I prefer PSA graded cards, but this one is amazing, snow white borders and simply amazing! Deep, deep Color like I have never seen on a Lumley. Super clean SCap 150 back caps it off. There are only 4 PSA 7's and 4 PSA 8's of all backs, so this is extremely tough to find in high grade. $975, scans below...thanks, price reduced to $875 delivered.**SOLD**
Will give this another shot as I just acquired it in a PSA 8. This card is incredible, trust me. Available for $750 delivered....thanks
